snippet.title: Ramboat 2 Gameplay (IOS, Android)
snippet.description:
Ramboat 2 - New Shooting Game 

Let's play Ramboat 2 on iPhone 8 Plus

Help Us To Reach More Subs     : http://goo.gl/pVnX0X
Like Page on Facebook                : https://goo.gl/yVQMBJ 

Dowload Link Below: 

Appstore:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ramboat-2-new-shooting-game/id1339138943?mt=8&ign-mpt=uo%3D4

Playstore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.generagames.ramboat2.bestarcadeshooter&hl=km

Description
------------------

A new Ramboat shooter adventure, a new war where to prove you’re the hero soldier who will defeat the Coronel and his army! Discover a New action arcade experience full of guns and bullets! Collect weapons, upgrade and customize your soldier, drive military vehicles, get ready for the combat and enter the best platform shooter game! Escape from hundreds of enemies, jumping and dodging as quickly as possible. Do you like running and killing? Are you addicted to jump and shoot?

Download Ramboat 2 - Soldier Shooter Game & Discover the New Ramboat adventure!

Survive an army of soldiers, paratroopers, rocket launchers and enemy submarines, dodge a hail of bullets while you unload all your arsenal on them. During your run, get power ups to increase your firepower and collect coins to upgrade your guns & craft new gears.

Make Ramboat unstoppable! Craft and upgrade weapons and gears with the gold you earn in each battle: shotguns, machine guns, rifles, uzis, rocket launchers. Shoot your best gun and destroy the enemy army! Armed from head to toe you will quickly run through the most dangerous combats. Customize your war hero with the fight item you’ll find in the battlefield, choose your outfit and improve your combat skills! Be a soldier legend!

Run, jump or roll, don’t stop shooting and perform an epic rush. Shot your rifle in slow motion and blow the enemy base with a grenade. In wartime, anything goes! Feel the blistering pace and the heat of battle in your hands. Assault all scenarios with your soldier hero and resist each challenge with strength. You have never seen before such an exciting and funny shooter game!

What is the biggest combo you can get? Complete all the missions and challenges to increase your military rank!

Game features:
